name: fire-simple-mocks
description: Simple mocks for developing firebase functions

scripts.local-publish: npm install --registry http://0.0.0.0:4873 && npm version patch && npm publish --registry http://0.0.0.0:4873 && git push origin --tags
scripts.publish: npm install && npm version patch && git push origin  && git push origin --tags && npm publish
